pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, January 10, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, January 10, 2018:

Hamilton, Ontario

1 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

Burridge Gymnasium, Ivor Wynne Centre
McMaster University
1280 Main Street West

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should enter through David Braley Athletic Centre main entrance ‎for registration no later than 12 p.m.

Media appearances

  • 7:45 a.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on Sunni and Hayes, 102.9 FM.
  • 9:05 a.m. – A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on The Bill Kelly Show, 900CHML.
